tool_description: An API serving the core FilterList information, including languages, licenses, maintainers, software, syntaxes, and tags for internet traffic filtering.
title: FilterLists Directory API

api_list.name: get_languages
api_list.description: Gets the languages targeted by the FilterLists.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = 'https://api.filterlists.com/v1/languages'
response = requests.get(url)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get_licenses
api_list.description: Gets the licenses applied to the FilterLists.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = 'https://api.filterlists.com/v1/licenses'
response = requests.get(url)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get_lists
api_list.code:
import requests

url = 'https://api.filterlists.com/v1/lists'
response = requests.get(url)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get_list_details
api_list.description: Gets the details of the FilterList.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = 'https://api.filterlists.com/v1/lists/{id}'
response = requests.get(url)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get_maintainers
api_list.description: Gets the maintainers of the FilterLists.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = 'https://api.filterlists.com/v1/maintainers'
response = requests.get(url)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get_software
api_list.description: Gets the software that subscribes to the FilterLists.
api_list.code:

url = 'https://api.filterlists.com/v1/software'

api_list.name: get_tags
api_list.description: Gets the tags of the FilterLists.
